009package Tools;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.WindowManager;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
016import imagingbook.common.ij.GuiTools;
017
018/**
019 * Resizes the window of the given image to fit an arbitrary, user-specified
020 * magnification factor.
021 * The resulting window size is limited by the current screen size.
022 * The window size is reduced if too large but the given magnification factor
023 * remains always unchanged.
024 * 
025 * @author WB
026 * @version 2020/10/08
027 */
028public class Zoom_Exact implements PlugIn {
029        
030        private static boolean LOG_OUTPUT = false;
031        
032        public void run(String arg) {
033                ImagePlus im = WindowManager.getCurrentImage();
034                if (im == null) {
035                        IJ.showMessage("No image open");
036                        return;
037                }
038                
039                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog("Zoom Exact");
040                gd.addNumericField("Magnification (%): ", GuiTools.getMagnification(im) * 100, 2);
041                gd.addCheckbox("Log output", LOG_OUTPUT);
042                gd.showDialog();
043                if (gd.wasCanceled())
044                        return;
045                
046                double mag = gd.getNextNumber() / 100.0;
047                LOG_OUTPUT = gd.getNextBoolean();
048                
049                if (mag < 0.001) {
050                        IJ.showMessage(String.format("Out of range magnification:\n%.3f", mag));
051                        return;
052                }
053                
054                if (GuiTools.zoomExact(im, mag)) {
055                        if (LOG_OUTPUT) {
056                                IJ.log(String.format("new magnification: %.3f",  GuiTools.getMagnification(im)));
057                        }
058                }
059                else {
060                        IJ.showMessage(Zoom_Exact.class.getSimpleName() + " failed");
061                }
062        }
063}
